game.name: Gravethorn
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Gravethorn은 소울라이크와 메트로이드베니아 요소를 결합한 2D 플랫포머 게임으로, 깊이 있는 스토리텔링을 제공합니다. 이야기는 기억을 잃은 [심문관]이 잃어버린 과거와 후회를 찾기 위해 떠나는 여정을 따라갑니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gravethorn is a 2D platformer that combines soulslike and metroidvania elements with deep storytelling. The story follows an Inquisitor who has lost his memory, searching for his forgotten past along with his regrets.
